1.title: Crazy Looking for Crazier
1.plot: "Payal Wadhwa, an aspiring actress, has dated before, but is yet to fall in love with someone who understands and appreciates her crazy side. She goes on a series of blind virtual dates with three bachelors - a telecom executive, a restaurateur and an actor. Each of whom do their best to impress her. She eventually chooses the one who matches her wavelength the most, but will she be disappointed when she finally discovers what he looks like?"

2.title: Love By-Chance
2.plot: Kajol is a witty and fun-loving vlogger who loves to make people laugh and happy with her online videos. However, she is yet to find the perfect man who makes her happy. She goes on multiple virtual dates with three bachelors - a businessman, a film maker and a yoga enthusiast. Kajol tries to find out who matches her wavelength, and who makes her happy; all without seeing each other. When she finally locks eyes with her chosen date, will her quest for love stand fulfilled?

3.title: How to win a Guy in 3 Dates
3.plot: Established singer and actor, Sreerama Chandra, feels the time is right to look for his perfect match. He goes on multiple dates with three different women - a sommelier, a fashion blogger and an aspiring actress. The catch? He can talk to them and see their world, but never gets to see their faces. When he finally sees his 'blind' date, will it be the perfect match he was waiting for?

4.title: Perfect Pitch
4.plot: Akasa has made a name for herself in the world of music and has always been passionate about whatever she does. Now, she's here to give love a shot. She goes on multiple blind dates with three bachelors - a celebrity manager, a commercial pilot and a fashion photographer. She will choose one of them without knowing what they look like. Eventually, will her heart be in tune with her eyes?

5.title: Miss Checklist
5.plot: Ruchika, only 21 years old, has a long checklist for the perfect boy. She is wooed by three men with diverse personalities - a tattoo artist, a budding chef and a final year student. Will any of them check all the boxes of Ruchika's long checklist? Or will her checklist go for a toss? Find out if she finds Mr. Right.

6.title: Dating Coach Looking for Love
6.plot: Anveshi, a dating coach herself, wants to find her soul mate. She has helped many people find love, but ironically is single herself. She goes on virtual dates with three boys - a fashion choreographer, a music producer and a writer. Since they can't see each other's face, each of the boys do their best to impress Anveshi, while giving a glimpse into their worlds. Will she find what she has found for so many others?

7.title: Too Hard to Please
7.plot: Deepti is an entrepreneur that has achieved a lot in her life. Fiercely independent, she has worked her way up to becoming a successful entrepreneur. In the process, her love life has taken a backseat. She's come here looking for a long-term relationship and goes on virtual dates with three bachelors - an ERP consultant, a hippie cafe owner and a photographer. All this via a camera mounted on the boy's chests. She makes a choice based on who impressed her the most, but will her choice hold when she comes face to face with her date?

8.title: Shaken, but still searching
8.plot: Priyanka Zemse, a marketing professional, faced heartbreak a couple of years ago. She was bitter and upset, but today is much stronger and cautious when it comes to dating. She virtually dates three bachelors - a musician, a model and a fitness instructor. All in one day, Priyanka virtual dates with all three boys before she makes her final choice. The boys wear a camera on their chest so that Priyanka can see and share their lives, but never see their faces. After finally discovering what he looks like, will she like who she has chosen?

9.title: Once Bitten Twice Shy
9.plot: Heena, a make-up artist from Delhi, lives life on her own terms. Having been hurt in love before, she is adamant that this time around she will not sacrifice her sense of self. She goes on multiple virtual dates with three boys - an anchor, a food photographer and a restaurateur. Each of them wear a camera on their chests to share their lives, but not their faces. Will her final date be a true meeting of the hearts?

10.title: No Time for Love
10.plot: Smriti Pandey, a 23-year-old microbiologist, hasn't had enough time away from her books to actually date someone. With the help of wing-woman, Shilpa Shetty Kundra, she's here to change that. Smriti is virtually introduced to three guys - a businessman, a telecom executive and a pastry chef. Each of them try to impress her through different dates and activities. The catch? She can only talk to them, but not see their faces. Will she find that perfect person to go on her first date with?

imdb.title: Hear Me. Love Me.
plot: A dating show where a woman goes on three virtual dates where she can see the world through her date's perspective but not see her date.
